overview.en: SCBC is Smart Car Block Chain platform token. It is based on the ERC-20 token standard and has a total supply of 2 billion tokens, with no further issuance. SCBC will circulate and be used throughout the ecosystem of the smart car chain, so it will have a wide range of usage scenarios and values in both B-end merchants and C-end users. The outlook for the SCBC ecosystem is to become a partner community. These partners include car dealers, car owners, financial institutions and transaction acquirer. The Fly Chain foundation aims to maintain and promote democratic management for members of the ecosystem
overview.zh: SCBC 是 Smart Car Block Chain 的简称， 是智慧车链平台发行的通证。SCBC基于ERC20发行，总量20亿枚，永不增发。SCBC 将在智慧车链整个生态中流通和使用，因此无论是B端商户还有C端用户，SCBC 将拥有广泛的使用场景和价值。SCBC生态系统的展望是成为一个合作伙伴社群。这些合作伙伴包括车商、车主、金融机构和交易获取者等。Fly Chain基金会旨在为该生态系统的成员维护并促进民主式管理。
